author: andyc
msg: Changed the parser to use a default error handler to print error
messages to the console if no error handler is registered. This
is a change in behavior from previous versions. This change now
requires a no-op error handler to be installed in order to "quiet"
This should solve once and for all the numerous reports of "bugs"
that the validator is not working because there was no output.

author: lehors
msg: added junit test from Lynn Monson

author: lehors
msg: Applied patch from Sebastian Sahuc and Neil Graham:
With this change the EntityResolver is correctly transmitted in the case when
'A.xsd' imports 'B.xsd' which in turn imports 'C.xsd', otherwise we end up
with an error message stating that the file 'C.xsd' couldn't be found in
the JVM working directory (din't build the C.xsd URL from the B.xsd URL)
